price: 18. Haddaad beenisaan (Xaqa), waxaa beeniyey ummado idinka horreeyey. Ma saarna Rasuulka waxaan ahayn Gaarsiin cad (ee Diinta Alle)6.
arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
footnotes: 6. Mufasiriinta waxay isku khilaafeen Aayaddan inay tahay mid la socota hadalkii Nabi Ibraahiim, ama hadal uu Alle ku samirsiinayo oo ugu laab qaboojinayo Nabi Muxammad s.c.w., sidase ka muuqata hal dhaca hadalka waa inay u tahay samirsiin iyo laab qaboojin Nabi Muxammad s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tukadhibū faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
